ygData.subject: RE: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: I gave up on the INT to 200 quest, and am now doing the CHA to 200 quest instead =) Last night I charmed a Cyclops for what seemed to be well over 5 minutes. I
ygData.messageBody:
I gave up on the INT to 200 quest, and am now doing
the CHA to 200 quest instead =)
Last night I charmed a Cyclops for what seemed to be
well over 5 minutes. I finally went invisible after he
stuck around for two fights, and let my group beat him
up. with 165 Charisma I notice a definate boost in
Charm....good thing I play care bear =)


--- Tim Borelli <timb@...> wrote:
> heh, all i have is a wis bag and cha bag... all my
> int stuff on me =) i'll
> worry about mana boosters when i get my INT over
> 200. i probably wont tho,
> being a human =P
>
> At 04:22 PM 11/18/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: Jeremy Cobb <jeremy@...>
> >
> >I agree. At 30+ it becomes a waste of time. But
> now im lvl 15 and have lvl
> >30+ stuff and 4k banked. I have an int bag,
> charisma bag, resistance bag,
> >mana and hp bag, and a misc bag. I think its a
> huge advantage to be able to
> >raise your stats so high so early in your life.
> >-----Original Message-----
>
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
> lead character animator
> "I dont suffer from insanity, I enjoy every minute
> of it..."
> Volition, Inc.
> timmyland@...
> http://www.timmyland.com
>
<HR>
<html>
